DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to assess safety, tolerability, pharmacokinetics and pharmacodynamics of SLV337 in patients with type 2 diabetes
DOC.brief_title: A Safety PK/PD Study of SLV337 in Patients With Type 2 Diabetes
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria Type 2 diabetes ,stable dose of Metformin,HbA1c >= 7%, but < 9% Exclusion Criteria Type 1 diabetes mellitus, Body Mass Index (BMI) >40.0 kg/m2, evidence of unstable cardiovascular diseases, NYHA class I to IV, ALT > 1.5 times UNL, creatinine clearance <60 mL/min
